## 自定义

通过设置 `type` 为 `wave` 也使用 `path`。

:::demo

```javascript
const data = [
  {
    sex: 'male',
    value: 45
  }
]

const shape =
  'M367.855,428.202c-3.674-1.385-7.452-1.966-11.146-1.794c0.659-2.922,0.844-5.85,0.58-8.719 c-0.937-10.407-7.663-19.864-18.063-23.834c-10.697-4.043-22.298-1.168-29.902,6.403c3.015,0.026,6.074,0.594,9.035,1.728 c13.626,5.151,20.465,20.379,15.32,34.004c-1.905,5.02-5.177,9.115-9.22,12.05c-6.951,4.992-16.19,6.536-24.777,3.271 c-13.625-5.137-20.471-20.371-15.32-34.004c0.673-1.768,1.523-3.423,2.526-4.992h-0.014c0,0,0,0,0,0.014 c4.386-6.853,8.145-14.279,11.146-22.187c23.294-61.505-7.689-130.278-69.215-153.579c-61.532-23.293-130.279,7.69-153.579,69.202 c-6.371,16.785-8.679,34.097-7.426,50.901c0.026,0.554,0.079,1.121,0.132,1.688c4.973,57.107,41.767,109.148,98.945,130.793 c58.162,22.008,121.303,6.529,162.839-34.465c7.103-6.893,17.826-9.444,27.679-5.719c11.858,4.491,18.565,16.6,16.719,28.643 c4.438-3.126,8.033-7.564,10.117-13.045C389.751,449.992,382.411,433.709,367.855,428.202z'

const { Chart, Progress, Tooltip } = qcharts

const chart = new Chart({ container: '#app' })

chart.source(data, {
  row: 'sex',
  text: 'sex',
  value: 'value'
})
setTimeout(e => {
  chart.source([
    {
      sex: 'male',
      value: 70
    }
  ])
}, 2000)

const progress = new Progress({
  min: 0,
  max: 100,
  type: 'wave',
  formatter: d => `当前工作进度：${d.value}%`,
  lineWidth: 2
}).style('normal', (attrs, d, i) => {
  return {
    shape: shape,
    wavesColor: ['#3488da', '#2c65c6'],
    amplitude: 20,
    shapeColor: '#58b8fe',
    shapeFillColor: '#e5f7ff'
  }
})

chart
  .add(progress)
  .add(new Tooltip({ formatter: d => `${d.sex}: ${d.value}%` }))

chart.render()
```

:::

:::demo

```javascript
const data = [
  {
    sex: 'male',
    value: 63
  },

  {
    sex: 'female',
    value: 55
  }
]

const shapes = [
  'M804.571429 402.285714v237.714286a54.857143 54.857143 0 0 1-109.714286 0V438.857143h-36.571429v521.142857c0 35.437714-28.562286 64-64 64s-64-28.562286-64-64V694.857143h-36.571428v265.142857c0 35.437714-28.562286 64-64 64S365.714286 995.437714 365.714286 960V438.857143H329.142857v201.142857a54.857143 54.857143 0 0 1-109.714286 0V402.285714c0-60.562286 49.152-109.714286 109.714286-109.714285h365.714286c60.562286 0 109.714286 49.152 109.714286 109.714285z m-164.571429-256c0 70.838857-57.161143 128-128 128S384 217.124571 384 146.285714 441.161143 18.285714 512 18.285714s128 57.161143 128 128z',

  'M877.714286 603.428571q0 22.857143-16 38.857143t-38.857143 16q-29.142857 0-45.714286-24.571428L647.428571 438.857143h-25.714285v75.428571l141.142857 234.857143q5.142857 8.571429 5.142857 18.857143 0 14.857143-10.857143 25.714286t-25.714286 10.857143H621.714286v155.428571q0 26.285714-18.857143 45.142857t-45.142857 18.857143H466.285714q-26.285714 0-45.142857-18.857143t-18.857143-45.142857v-155.428571H292.571429q-14.857143 0-25.714286-10.857143t-10.857143-25.714286q0-10.285714 5.142857-18.857143l141.142857-234.857143V438.857143h-25.714285l-129.714286 194.857143q-16.571429 24.571429-45.714286 24.571428-22.857143 0-38.857143-16t-16-38.857143q0-16.571429 9.142857-30.285714l146.285715-219.428571q41.714286-61.142857 100.571428-61.142857h219.428572q58.857143 0 100.571428 61.142857l146.285715 219.428571q9.142857 13.714286 9.142857 30.285714zM640 146.285714q0 53.142857-37.428571 90.571429T512 274.285714t-90.571429-37.428571T384 146.285714t37.428571-90.571428T512 18.285714t90.571429 37.428572T640 146.285714z'
]

const { Chart, Progress, Tooltip } = qcharts

const chart = new Chart({ container: '#app' })

chart.source(data, {
  row: 'sex',
  text: 'sex',
  value: 'value'
})

const colors = ['#1296db', '#d4237a']

const progress = new Progress({
  min: 0,
  max: 100,
  lineWidth: 2,
  type: 'wave',
  formatter: d => `${d.value}`
}).style('normal', (attrs, d, i) => {
  return {
    outlineColor: colors[i],
    wavesColor: colors[i],
    shape: shapes[i],
    shapeColor: colors[i],
    shapeScale: 0.2
  }
})

chart.add(progress).add(new Tooltip({ formatter: d => `${d.value}` }))

chart.render()
```

:::
